0.0.22.en: fix conversion for power, KW was not converted to watts

0.0.21.en: better error handling when you don't have new key and secret, see the readme for requesting them

0.0.20.en: Using the new api endpoint (old is down) but requires a key and secret, see the readme for requesting them

0.0.8.en: Support for generating power on the energy, had to rename measure_power-current to measure_power to support this, requires reinstall of your device so the values shows up again.
